name: 99 Lives
description:
99 Lives. 11 Levels. Hardcore Parkour. Can you complete it all?

99 Lives is a game made in Unity for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

The game contains parkour elements while sticking to the jam's theme: An end is a new beginning. Every time you die, something happens. 

CONTROLS:
Run: A/D or 🡰/🡲
Jump: SPACE (Press and Hold to Jump Higher)
Pause: Esc

The game is playable in the browser. Alternatively you can also download a .zip file and run the executable inside.

Disclaimer: Few people might find the game difficult. 

P.S.: I love making hard games, but I've considerably made this one easier, except for a few levels here and there.

Credits:
- Character: https://dani-maccari.itch.io/player-animations-tim
- Music: Never Gonna Give You Up - 8 Bit Universe
- Everything else: TheLetterIsH (Me)
